ISSUE.TITLE: Add SQL Server index (Product_Category_Mapping, etc)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm testing on database with >600000 products and >30000 categories Using version 3.8 SQL Server load was around 60% CPU. SQL Server monitoring suggested to add these indexes: Product_Category_Mapping: NON CLUSTERED on ProductId and IsFeaturedProduct including CategoryId NON CLUSTERED on ProductId Product_Picture_Mapping: NON CLUSTERED on ProductId These dropped server load sometimes to zero. And now it mostly runs 10-30%. So its highly suggested.
